message: Let's start with a fair split, 60-40 in my favor. I'll make it worth your while if you accept.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more. It's a tough negotiation!
You're being too greedy, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need a fair share.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away all my power yet. You'll have to do better than that!
I'm not backing down, Bob. You're going to have to meet me halfway if you want to get a decent share.
I'm not going to give in yet, Alice. I think I deserve more, but I'm willing to compromise. You're getting closer, but not close enough!
I'm not going to give up, Bob. You're getting desperate, and I'm getting stronger. Meet me at this price or walk away.
